description: This file implements a React functional component called Onboarding, which provides a form for users to input team details such as name, size, and work mode during an onboarding process. It includes UI components like Container, Card, Button, and Progress, manages local state with React hooks, and interacts with external state and actions via useStore. The component facilitates navigation via window.location.hash and handles saving the form data asynchronously.

methods.name: Onboarding()
methods.description: React functional component that renders an onboarding form to collect team information and navigate to a quiz page.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Asynchronous handler function that saves team data via external actions and navigates to the quiz page.
